content.full_text: Petition of Alexander Evans and Others to Robert E. Horner, 8 July 18481 We the undersigned members of theHouse of Repsdo request thatA, G, Matlackbe retained in his present situation as messenger
paragraphs: Petition of Alexander Evans and Others to Robert E. Horner, 8 July 18481 We the undersigned members of theHouse of Repsdo request thatA, G, Matlackbe retained in his present situation as messenger

footnotes.text:
1The author of this petition is unknown. Abraham Lincoln  and the other signatories
                  signed their own names.
2The first session of the ThirtiethCongressended on August 14, 1848.U.S. HouseJournal. 1848. 30th Cong., 1st sess., 1294.
3Robert E. Horner wrote and signed this docketing.

structured_content.text: Petition of Alexander Evans and Others to Robert E. Horner, 8 July 18481
We the undersigned members of theHouse of Repsdo request thatA, G, Matlackbe retained in his present situation as messenger
